snippet: The dismissal of the commander, Gen. Saeed Shokrian, follows investigations by Iranian officials into the unexplained death of a blogger who criticized Iran’s financial contributions to Hezbollah.
lead_paragraph: The dismissal of the commander, Gen. Saeed Shokrian, follows investigations by Iranian officials into the unexplained death of a blogger who criticized Iran’s financial contributions to Hezbollah.

headline.seo: After Death of Sattar Beheshti, Iranian Blogger, Head of Tehran’s Cybercrimes Unit Is Fired
headline.main: Head of Tehran’s Cybercrimes Unit Is Fired Over Death of Blogger
headline.print_headline: Head of Tehran’s Cybercrimes Unit Is Fired Over Death of Blogger
